original_text: Who do you think you are laughing at? Who are you insulting? Who are you pointing at with your tongue? You are people who have turned against God. You love to tell lies. Who do you think you are laughing at?
korean_text: 너희가 누구를 희롱하느냐 누구를 향하여 입을 크게 벌리며 혀를 내미느냐 너희는 패역의 자식, 거짓의 후손이 아니냐

sentences.original_text: Who do you think you are laughing at?
Who are you pointing at with your tongue?
You are people who have turned against God.
Who do you think you are laughing at?
